Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24211081] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC>500 mg/L), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC>500 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC>500 mg/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC>500 mg/L);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC>500 mg/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.24211081] HC10>2000 mg/L against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans

Literature.Author: Ong ZY, Cheng J, Huang Y, Xu K, Ji Z, Fan W, Yang YY
